data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in El Seybo, Dominican Republic to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 79,620 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Seybo, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of El Seybo, Dominican Republic know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of El Seybo who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in El Seybo, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Japanese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Japanese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Japanese people is yours.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in El Seybo with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in El Seybo, Dominican Republic, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.section_summary:
the state of El Seybo, Dominican Republic has a population of 89,300.

We estimate El Seybo has 9,679 people who might know Jesus, 74,077 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,543 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in El Seybo who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
